A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great\, not excellent. Some of the plot twists were great\, some were stolen from previous episodes. The master coder was a huge huge waste of time. Seemed to be more fails than successes. Let’s try this and fail. Okay\, let’s try that\, fail. For a movie seeking hope\, it was hard to find. Really disappointed in the reveal of Rae’s parents. I hope that will be a plot twist back to something better than what they revealed.
